title: 25 Best-Selling Korean Skincare and Beauty Products For Your Routine
text: Every item on this page was chosen by an ELLE editor. We may earn commission on some of the items you choose to buy. Find your skin care solution here. The hashtag #koreanskincare alone generates 1.3 billion views on TikTok (at the time of writing), with rows and rows of videos on how to achieve glass skin, what products are great for hyperpigmentation, and which sunscreens won't leave a pasty white film behind. Everyone is on the hunt for smooth, filter-like, glass skin and we have the rise of K-Beauty brands and education surrounding Korean skincare practices to thank. Scroll through enough videos and you'll learn the number one rule of K-Beauty: skin comes first. “K-beauty has a ‘skin-first’ philosophy, which [prioritizes] caring for your skin and getting to the root of the condition, instead of covering it up with makeup. K-beauty has gained so much popularity in the US in recent years because of its high-quality ingredients, innovative products, accessible price points, and the fact that it is based on a lifestyle that is focused on having good skin care habits,” Charlotte Cho, esthetician and founder of popular K-Beauty e-tailer Soko Glam tells ELLE.com. With the help of e-tailers like Soko Glam, healthy, clear skin is not only attainable but accessible. Now, skincare obsessives have an arsenal of products to choose from to help them achieve their skin goals—but which ones are actually worth it? Below, the 25 best Korean skincare products to add to your cart, plus some of Cho's favorites. Double-cleansing is a tedious step, so here's a gentle balm that removes every trace of makeup, sunscreen, and oil with a nourishing formula of  vitamin E and fatty acids. Amazon star rating: 4.7/5 stars An Amazon reviewer said: “This is a great cleansing balm. The packaging is attractive so I don’t mind leaving this on my counter. A little goes a long way so this should last a good while. This cleans my skin really well with little effort. My skin feels and looks so amazing after using too. I would purchase again!” If your skincare routine is packed with strong actives, this mask by Dr. Jart+ is basically a band-aid for inflamed, irritated, or stressed skin. Sephora star rating: 4.6/5 stars A Sephora reviewer said: “I have acne prone skin and I struggle with picking my face. This is THE best product I have used, and I’ve tried everything. It heals 75%-90% of my acne almost completely over night, even open wounds.” Corsx’s bestselling essence is always out of stock, and for a good reason. Touted for imparting a surge of hydration to parched skin, the lightweight, slimy mixture also repairs, soothes, and brightens the skin. Ulta star rating: 4.7/5 stars An Ulta reviewer said: “I purchased this 5 days ago and have used it consistently in the morning and night applied to damp skin and under moisturizer. I have eczema and sensitive skin, and I highly recommend this stuff! I wake up with clearer and more hydrated skin each day.” As a self-professed lazy beauty girl, I'm a sucker for any product that does all my hard work so I can get to bed faster. At the end of the day, I always reach for Sulwhasoo's cleansing oil, which is less oily and more of a gentle soap, because the moisturizing formula strips away any traces of a long day so my skin can reset for the day ahead. Amazon star rating: 4.3/5 stars An Amazon reviewer said: “I absolutely love how it goes on as an oil to remove waterproof makeup but rinses off with just warm water. Leaves your skin feeling soft and hydrated.” Glass skin is exactly what this serum aims to give you, and it delivers on its claims thanks to a potent cocktail of niacinamide, hyaluronic acid, peach extract, and more. Ulta star rating: 4.5/5 stars An Ulta reviewer said: “Notice results in a week, which is rare for me. I finally decided to buy after dappling into skincare for the first time and was not disappointed! Expensive feeling packaging. Everything about it is great.” Amorepacific comes at a higher price point than most K-Beauty products, but that's because your skin is receiving the absolute best of the best ingredients. Hyaluronic acid and green tea enzymes join forces to provide the ultimate hydration in this cleansing powder. Amazon star rating: 4.6/5 stars An Amazon reviewer said: “This has been the best cleanser for my oily, finicky, zit-prone skin. I use it morning and night. Cleans and polishes and does not dry out my skin. Love it. Also, a gem to travel with since not a liquid.” This essence is tailor-made for those with acne-prone or sensitive skin. Missha used the special herb artemisia extract and its anti-inflammatory properties to clear out clogged pores and soothe skin. Soko Glam star rating: 4.5/5 stars A Soko Glam reviewer said: “My husband and I both love this so much. We both have sensitive skin. My husband used this after being on accutane. Super hydrating and calming. I use this everyday, twice a day and as a great base for my makeup routine.” Banila’s cleansing balm is a non-irritating formula that can remove makeup on the face and eyes—worry-free. Ulta star rating: 4.4/5 stars An Ulta reviewer said: “This stuff seriously is so good. I put a little on, rub it all over my face, and whip it off with the makeup erase towel and EVERYTHING comes off the first swipe. LITERALLY MELTS YOUR MAKEUP OFF.” Mimic the sunkissed glow of your dreams with just a few drops of this serum. After a few uses, watch your skin woes slowly disappear with the help of niacinamide and betaine salicylate. Amazon star rating: 4.5/5 stars An Amazon reviewer said: “I love skin products that have rice in them because they’re gentle, yet effective. I use this product in my nightly routine and noticed it immediately makes my skin softer and brighter.” Remember when watermelon-infused skincare was all the rage? We have Glow Recipe to thank for keeping that movement alive. The brand's cult-favorite Dew Drops wakes you up with a light watermelon smell and brightens dull skin over time. Tired, aging skin doesn’t stand a chance against this supercharged cream, which plumps and revives skin with Sulwhasoo’s signature Ginsenomics complex built around soothing ginseng. Sephora star rating: 4.5/5 stars A Sephora reviewer said: “This formula is amazing!!! Leaving my skin feeling plump and nourished! The packaging is luxe, and I love the ingredients used! Highly recommend and will keep using this !!!” These patches are strong enough to pull out all the oil and gunk from any breakouts wreaking havoc on your skin. Amazon star rating: 4.6/5 stars An Amazon reviewer said: “I love COSRX and this product did not disappoint. You put these patches on top of any pimple and it'll help minimize the appearance and get rid of it. They work very well and they're super easy to use. They stick well and they're easy to take off, exactly like a sticker.” Snail slime extract in skincare is commonly used to repair the skin and restore moisture. This cream is formulated to be a savior for damaged skin that desperately needs healing, hydration, and radiance. Amazon star rating: 4.5/5 stars An Amazon reviewer said: “I’ve been using this product for about 7 years, and it is the holy grail of all my skincare products. It is so light, yet very moisturizing and healing. It has a wonderful smell and absorbs quickly. I cannot believe how soft and hydrating this is on my skin. Cannot recommend enough!” This lip mask needs no introduction because, by now, you've likely come across rave reviews of this Laneige bestseller online or here at ELLE.com. With each stroke, your lips are enveloped in a buttery blend of vitamin C and antioxidants that leave your pout soft and kissable. Here’s another snail mucin-infused product worthy of all the hype it’s received. The slimy gel-like formula transforms to a light liquid when smoothed across the face and absorbs quickly to give parched skin deep nourishment. Soko Glam star rating: 4.8 stars A Soko Glam reviewer said: “I absolutely love this essence. It is light on the skin and my skin feels refreshed and clean all day. Highly recommend this product.” This feather-light eye cream delivers supple skin for up to 26 hours. Thanks to its light consistency, it can be applied right before makeup to prevent any cracks or creasing. Amazon star rating: 4.7/5 stars An Amazon reviewer said: “Love how it makes my eyes feel. Gives the extra moisture without the greasy feeling.” Where some sunscreens leave you a greasy mess, Innisfree’s iteration offers a soft, light veil of protection that blends like butter into the skin. Amazon star rating: 4.6/5 stars An Amazon reviewer said: “This sunscreen leaves no white cast, [is] easy to spread on the face, and has a great scent. It’s not expensive and great for travel. I have one in my room, my car, and my purse. My go-to sunscreen.” This cleansing oil was created for those with oily or acne-prone skin to ensure your skin is being properly treated from the very first step. As your makeup is removed, salicylic acid removes excess oil and dirt to clear congested skin. Ulta star rating: 4.4/5 stars An Ulta reviewer said: “I use this product in the shower in the mornings to cleanse my face. I love the citrus scent. I have sensitive skin; this product works for me. It leaves my skin silky smooth after using it.” If your skin is looking for relief, you can find it in this bottle. The serum has a cooling sensation that feels like a fresh splash of water, and a super nourishing finish that locks all that moisture in place. Amazon star rating: 4.5/5 stars An Amazon reviewer said: “This is a great serum, very slick but not sticky or greasy. Good for sensitive skin.” No pamper routine is complete without a sheet mask—and a glass of wine. This set of sheet masks encourages you to rest as it strengthens and repairs the barrier with a calming formula of calendula extract, hyaluronic acid, and avocado extract. Soko Glam star rating: 4.9/5 stars A Soko Glam reviewer said: “I can’t stop repurchasing. Meets all the needs of my acne-prone, dehydrated, and dull skin at once.” Nerisha is the beauty commerce editor at ELLE.com, covering all things beauty (and fashion and music).
